pr_title: Add REST APIs for IndexTemplateV2Metadata CRUD

timeline.message:
Add REST APIs for IndexTemplateV2Metadata CRUD

This commit adds the get/put/delete APIs for interacting with the now v2 versions of index
templates.

These APIs are behind the existing `es.itv2_feature_flag_registered` system property feature flag.

Relates to #53101

timeline.bodyText: maybe all the action names should contain index_template instead of template_v2? In this it would be indices:admin/index_template/delete. When v1 has been removed the v2 name is going to be confusing and changing that isn't fun from a bwc point of view.
timeline.author: martijnvg

replies.bodyText: true, I originally went with template_<something> so people could do template*, but it looks like people use template/* anyway, so it wouldn't work. I'll change these to index_template
replies.author: dakrone

timeline.bodyText: Are tests for this method going to be added later or should the tests be part of this PR?
timeline.author: martijnvg

replies.bodyText: Planning on adding these later when template validation is added (since that will directly change and test these methods)
replies.author: dakrone

replies.bodyText: Would it make sense to do it like in component templates? Basic tests in initial PR and extending tests when validation is added?
replies.author: probakowski

timeline.bodyText: Maybe move the logic of this method also to a static method, so that it can be unit tested?
timeline.author: martijnvg

timeline.bodyText: Maybe also add unit tests for the request classes?
timeline.author: martijnvg

replies.bodyText: So I'm not sure what they would test? They don't implement hashcode and equals (just like our other, existing, template requests), and they don't have toXContent, so they wouldn't really be testing much? Is it worth adding the hashcode and equals implementations so that we can add tests for the requests?
replies.author: dakrone

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I should have been more specific. These tests would extend from AbstractWireSerializingTestCase and test the binary wire serialisation. The requests can then either implement equals() / hashcode() methods or in the test you can overwrite the assertEqualInstances() method.
replies.author: martijnvg

replies.bodyText: Okay, I've added these unit tests.
replies.author: dakrone

timeline.message: Use index_template instead of template_v2 in action names
Move removal to static method and add test
Add unit tests for request classes (implement hashCode & equals)
